text: This is @rafaellacava10 who #Venezuela dictator Maduro is sending to Washington to try & find someone to meet with him & “negotiate” the lifting of U.S. sanctions.I encourage you to review his twitter feed & videos & draw your own conclusions about how that is going to go http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DXbCe70VwAITLzO.jpg

While far too many aren’t paying attention #China is spreading it’s internet censorship across the world. Sadly U.S. tech like @facebook @Apple & @Google comply & even assist them in order to gain or maintain access to China’s internet market. https://www.nytimes.com/2018/03/02/technology/china-technology-censorship-borders-expansion.html?smprod=nytcore-ipad&smid=nytcore-ipad-share

The @USNavy aircraft carrier Carl Vinson will arrive in  #Vietnam for a 4 day port of call.The U.S. remains strongly committed to freedom of navigation in the south #China sea & our alliances with allies including #Japan #SouthKorea & #India  https://www.nytimes.com/2018/03/04/world/asia/carl-vinson-vietnam.html?smprod=nytcore-ipad&smid=nytcore-ipad-share

Here is an example of how #China censors free speech in the U.S. An American employee of @Marriott “Liked” a post thanking Marriott for listing #Tibet as a country.China got http://mad.To protect access to the China market Marriott fired him! https://www.wsj.com/articles/marriott-employee-roy-jones-hit-like-then-china-got-mad-1520094910

RT @ShaunKing I love this! When @CoryBooker first put this bold reform bill out there, the only people who supported it either smoked weed or fought full time for justice reform.  It's finally catching on. https://twitter.com/SenGillibrand/status/970003837888024577 QT @SenGillibrand The Marijuana Justice Act takes steps to fix stark inequalities in our criminal justice system and protects patients who need medication. It’s a commonsense bill – and I’m proud to join @CoryBooker as a cosponsor. Americans have spoken and demanded change. It’s time to act. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/969949092720898048/img/-qLpdFCNZ6tHKtug.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/969949092720898048/vid/240x240/5HnZQLnEi1WEWNgf.mp4

RT @RepTerriSewell Such an honor to walk the path of the Selma to Montgomery voting rights march with my friends @SenKamalaHarris and @SenDougJones #MLKPilgrimage http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DXdHzIpW0AA87Xk.jpg

“No country can ever truly flourish if it stifles the potential of its women and deprives itself of the contributions of half of its citizens.” —Michelle Obama #WomensHistoryMonth http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DXdfNyuUQAAVDv4.jpg

It's an honor to be part of this celebration and commemoration for those who marched at Selma 53 years ago. This movement has always been about fighting for the ideals of the country we love. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DXdeZUiVAAArkAd.jpg

The courage of those who marched at Selma 53 years ago is an inspiration to all of us. I was honored to join today’s commemoration. Let’s continue to carry on the cause of justice and equality. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DXd13hGWsAAXweX.jpg
To any of us who feels daunted, or discouraged, or dispirited - if you need inspiration, I say: look to Selma.

DACA expires tomorrow – and the future of 800,000 Dreamers is more  uncertain than ever. Here are the stories of 7 Dreamers who are holding  out hope that Congress will pass a #DreamActNow. https://medium.com/@SenWarren/meet-our-dreamers-3d1d8dc19077

Nazareth Girls Basketball is a winning tradition. Congratulations to the Swiftettes for claiming their 22nd State Championship basketball title in school history -- more than any other public high school in the U.S.! https://twitter.com/uiltexas/status/970036382088404992 QT @uiltexas Nazareth wins its fourth state title in five years, giving the Swiftettes a state-leading 22 #UILState Girls Basketball Championships. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/970005892077727745/img/SM-sl9x8KKeFG1PQ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/970005892077727745/vid/326x180/FSkkNQqucFfYPUd-.mp4

Erasing student lunch debt is an incredible way to honor the memory of Philando Castile. It is also a stark reminder that we need to reform our school lunch programs to ensure no student goes hungry or is humiliated because of overdue debt. https://www.cnn.com/2018/03/03/us/philando-castile-lunch-debt/index.html?sr=twCNN030318philando-castile-lunch-debt0218PMVODtop&utm_content=buffere4794&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter.com&utm_campaign=buffer

Our goal is to advance an agenda that prioritizes justice and equality once again -- that expands voting rights, reforms our broken criminal justice system, and fosters real economic opportunity for ALL Americans, not just the top 1%

When I think about @repjohnlewis, and all the folks who marched from Selma to Montgomery, I am always inspired by their resilience, by their strength, and by their fight for America to achieve her ideals. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DXfXaUJWkAIhPrg.jpg
